M

main(String[]) - Static method in class mpipar.MPIPar
 
MPI_AccessedData - Class in mpipar
contains information about the accessed data neccessary to generate communication code like if it is scalar or array the variable symbol the datatype if reduction variable or not index of the parallel loop, where this accessed data belongs for Array type - array access - number of dimensions - dimension where the parallel loop index is found - block multiplier - which is number of elements to the right of the dimension where parallel loop is found
MPI_AccessedData(Symbol) - Constructor for class mpipar.MPI_AccessedData
 
MPI_Analysis - Class in mpipar
find mpi parallel loops and shared variables info with in these loops attach mpi parallel and mpi sharedvariables (list) annotations to found parallel loops also add mpi reduction (map>) annotation to the loops whic are used by the MPI_LoopTransform pass
MPI_Analysis(Program) - Constructor for class mpipar.MPI_Analysis
 
MPI_Annotation - Class in mpipar
 
MPI_Annotation() - Constructor for class mpipar.MPI_Annotation
 
MPI_Annotation(String, Object) - Constructor for class mpipar.MPI_Annotation
 
MPI_Finalize - Class in mpipar
 
MPI_Finalize(Program) - Constructor for class mpipar.MPI_Finalize
 
MPI_LoopNormalize - Class in mpipar
try to normalize all for loops add MPI normalized -- annotation to those normalized correctly which will be later used by the MPI_Analysis pass
MPI_LoopNormalize(Program) - Constructor for class mpipar.MPI_LoopNormalize
 
MPI_LoopTransform - Class in mpipar
parse MPI parallel - MPI accessedData - MPI reduction - annotations and find the neccessary infos to partition parallel loops - and add communication codes
MPI_LoopTransform(Program, String, boolean) - Constructor for class mpipar.MPI_LoopTransform
 
MPI_Utility - Class in mpipar
 
MPI_Utility() - Constructor for class mpipar.MPI_Utility
